ygData.subject: Re: I heard about some equipment...
ygData.msgSnippet: The level 28 pixie song is exactly that, a targeted lullaby.  It is a very useful song! ... _______________________________________________________________ Get
ygData.messageBody:
The level 28 pixie song is exactly that, a targeted lullaby. It is a very
useful song!

>From: John Kim <kim@...>
>Maybe we could suggest Verant replace one of the "useless"
>songs (e.g. Charisma or Identify) with a targeted lullaby
>which only works on a single mob? I died yesterday because
>I ran across a newbie (level 5) being beat up by two bandits.
>I started my lullaby to make it a fair one-on-one fight, and
>shortly afterwards a wandering guard killed me.
>
